import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; function LogInForm() { const [state, setState] = useState({ email: "", password: "", }); function handleChange(event) { const tempState = { ...state }; tempState[event.currentTarget.name] = event.currentTarget.value; setState(tempState); } function handleSubmit(event) {} return (

); } export default LogInForm;
